column1: ah what? WHO lauds Sweden as a ‘model’ in coronavirus fight for resisting lockdown
Nobody: Nobody: Actually Nobody: Internet Explorer RN: China reports first case of Corona virus. We need to be careful.

Me: “God, can’t we have something else going on other than a constant diet of #coronavirus news?” God: “One ‘cop-killing-a-black-man-on-camera’ special, with a side order of riots, coming right up!” Me: “Fuck, I hate this restaurant.”

They are TRYING to get coronavirus infecting the population as quickly as possible. Once the number of deaths skyrocketed, they had to do it by stealth. Johnson is on the record as saying explicitly this. Economy before citizens' lives. Conservatism.
